pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Test Design Approach to Fixed and Adaptive Test Construction // Uses the optimal test design approach by Birnbaum (1968, ISBN:9781593119348) and van der Linden (2018) doi:10.1201/9781315117430 to construct fixed, adaptive, and parallel tests. Supports the following mixed-integer programming (MIP) solver packages: 'Rsymphony', 'gurobi', 'lpSolve', and 'Rglpk'. The 'gurobi' package is not available from CRAN; see https://www.gurobi.com/downloads/.
